          <title>
            <string language="en-US">The War of 1812</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">This flipchart describes the War of 1812 from the first battle of the U.S.S. Constitution to the Battle of New Orleans. It includes paintings of the major battles and important participants, as well as a link to the song The Battle of New Orleans by Johnny Horton.</string>
